speaker: Doctor
text: Can you tell me more about the swelling and pain in your right ring finger? When did it start, and have you noticed any triggers that make it better or worse?

speaker: Patient
text: "It started about 2 days ago, I was playing football and got caught in the jersey of another player, he pulled away pretty forcefully. To be honest, it hurts when I try to flex my finger at the end when I make a fist, and it's also pretty sore when I keep it straight out."

speaker: Doctor
text: Can you tell me more about the progression of the swelling and pain? Has it been constant or has it come and gone over time?

speaker: Patient
text: "It's been getting progressively worse over the past 24 hours, to be honest. I woke up this morning and it was pretty sore, and by the time I came to the clinic, it was even more swollen and painful. I've tried to move my finger around, but the pain is definitely worse when I try to do specific movements, like bending or straightening it."
